name: Pony Eats
description:
Pony Eats is a very short game in which you move around and click to shoot an evasive pony in a forest, with (un?)expected deaths likely resulting.

Controls:

- WSAD to walk and Spacebar to jump

- Hold Shift to run

- Mouse 1 to shoot

I made this to put together many of the concepts and mechanics I had previously learnt in the Coursera courses Introduction to Game Development and Principles of Game Design, both of which are offered by Michigan State University.

 I took inspiration for the concept from a certain category of film (won't spoil it) in which the protagonists never really "win".

Have fun! Try not to get too greedy in your proximity to the pony!
